Class SourceCodeStyle

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Class that determines the style used when displaying source code.

    • Method Detail

      • getStyle

        public org.conqat.lib.commons.collections.ImmutablePair<Color,Integer> getStyle(eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner.ETokenType tokenType)
        Returns the color/font style pair for a given token type. The default implementation provides a generic highlighting roughly following the one of java.

      • getStyle

        public org.conqat.lib.commons.collections.ImmutablePair<Color,Integer> getStyle(IToken token)
        Returns the color/font style pair for a given token.
